lines: Gye wɔn a wɔrey'ra, Hwɛ wɔn' a wɔr'wu,
Fa 'yamhyehye hwim wɔn fi bɔn' ne wum';
Su ma akwantofo: Ma wɔn so fi fam
Ka Yesu, ɔgyefo, ho nsɛm ky'rɛ wɔn.
Wɔmfa No nyɛ hwee de, Nso ɔwɛn ara;
Frɛ wɔn anib're so, Ka  wɔn brɛbrɛ bra;
Sɛ wɔgye di nkō a ɔde bef'ri wɔn.
Gye wɔn a wɔrey'ra, Ͻyɛ w'asede,
San kɔ kwan teaa no so, Gye wɔn boasetɔm
Ka 'Gyenkwa wu ky'rɛ wɔn a wɔafom kwan.
